participant_1.background:
I once went on a 10 day silent retreat.
i live in rural wisconsin.
i just took a trip to london.
my passion is writing.
my favorite band is dream theater.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with my friend, who is a native Spanish speaker.
i am a sixth grade teacher.
i do not eat well.
I am an artist from a small town in the midwest.
i like watching sports.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.  How about you?
I'm doing alright, just finished a 10 day silent retreat in Wisconsin.
Wow, that's intense!  How was it?
It was really interesting.  It was a good experience to spend some time alone with my thoughts and feelings.
I bet.  I'm not sure I could do that.  I'm a sixth grade teacher and I don't get much time to myself.
I can understand that.  I'm a writer and I love having time to myself to work on my projects.
That sounds like a really fun job.
It can be, but it can also be challenging.
I bet.  What's the most challenging thing about your job?
The most challenging part is staying motivated when I'm not feeling creative.
I can understand that.  I have that problem with my art sometimes.
What kind of art do you do?
I'm an artist from a small town in the Midwest.  I paint and draw.
That sounds really cool.  Do you ever show your work?
I have a few shows under my belt.  I'm working on getting more shows in the area.
That's awesome.  I'd love to see your work sometime.
I'd love to show you.  Maybe we can meet up for lunch sometime.
That sounds like a plan.  I'd love to meet you.
Great!  I'll send you my number.
